item.title: Understanding the Buyer’s Journey: A Comprehensive Guide
item.description:
Discover the stages of the buyer’s journey and how they influence purchasing decisions. Learn how to incorporate the buyer’s journey into your sales process.

item.title: 3 Steps to Address Human Impact of AI Adoption in the Workplace
item.description:
In this TechRepublic exclusive, Gartner analyst Autumn Stanish provides proactive and compassionate steps IT leaders can take to support employees as they navigate transitions related to AI integration.

Go to Source

item.title: 5 Best Linux CentOS Replacement Options & Alternatives
item.description:
Red Hat’s decision to end CentOS is forcing most developers and companies to find an alternative OS. In this guide, learn about the top competitors’ features.

Go to Source

item.title: EleKtra-Leak Campaign Uses AWS Cloud Keys Found on Public GitHub Repositories to Run Cryptomining Operation
item.description:
In the active Elektra-Leak campaign, attackers hunt for Amazon IAM credentials within public GitHub repositories before using them for cryptomining. Get tips on mitigating this cybersecurity threat.

Go to Source

item.title: Mind the Gap: Cloud Spending is Perplexing CFOs
item.description:
Cloud spending confusion is rising among CFOs. An IBM executive explains how FinOps, automation, and AI-powered solutions can improve cost visibility and management.

Go to Source
